question: The time in which 80000 Rs. Amounts to 92610 Rs. At 10% per annum compound interest, interest being compounded semi annually is :
explanation:
Time = t half year and R = 5% per half year
$latex \\therefore A = P\\left ( 1+\\frac{R}{100} \\right )^{T}&s=1$
$latex => \\frac{92610}{80000} = \\left ( 1+\\frac{5}{100} \\right )^{T} = \\left ( \\frac{21}{20} \\right )^{T}&s=1$
$latex => \\frac{9261}{8000} = \\left ( \\frac{21}{20} \\right )^{3}= \\left ( \\frac{21}{20} \\right )^{T}&s=1$
âˆ´ T = 3 half years or $latex 1\\frac{1}{2}&s=1$ years
Hence option [A] is correct answer.
